name: places/ChIJga-hb1JYwokRojDq-2ki4lY
formattedAddress: 444 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 444 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036-6322, USA

editorialSummary.text: Flower shop offering plants & arrangements for everyday & special occasions, plus event services.

originalText.text: I bought peonies last Friday around 1 pm and employees said they will open and bloom in a couple of hours. I asked again: are you sure? Because those flowers have been so closed and look like they have been frozen before. He said yes. And all the time when I tried to ask for more questions he’s ignoring me because he have been watching some series on the phone so I was an unlucky customer. By the end, he said that flowers need a cooler place to open. I changed the water a couple of times but nothing changes. This is not what you expect when you buy flowers for $56. The one peony is $17. And I bought 3 of them. It’s a waste of money if you get flowers like that. Today is Sunday 11 am, so even not 2 days after those flowers don’t open well. Also, the smell is not good too. I know how it is supposed to smell because peonies are my favorite flowers but those flowers are something weird. I’m super disappointed. I want my money back. This store is closed on weekends and closing very early on weeks. I didn’t get the chance to return those flowers on Friday. It’s insane! I don’t recommend you to buy peonies at this store.

originalText.text: I needed a same day delivery 10 months ago and came across FreshCut Flowers- WOW! Their work is amazing! I've told everyone in my office as well parter agencies, and they all love their work! Professional and easy to communicate with. They work around my (my bosses) color/flower/price preference. I've never received an arrangement which I'm disappointed with or ashamed to hand over! Lol Great job guys!! (G from Geometry!)

originalText.text: Had flowers delivered to my daughter on her birthday and they arrived at the hotel as promised on time.  Her response was priceless!! These are the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen!! Gorgeous arrangement! Thank you guys! Wonderful job! Killed it!

text.text: Had flowers delivered to my daughter on her birthday and they arrived at the hotel as promised on time.  Her response was priceless!! These are the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen!! Gorgeous arrangement! Thank you guys! Wonderful job! Killed it!

originalText.text: I came in with a budget and they worked their magic to make me something beautiful and custom. The flowers were not only beautiful; but also fresh. My partner LOVED them. 10/10 would return. The man who helped me was also very helpful.

originalText.text: This florist is extremely rude! The staff member was extremely rude and didn't seem to care for any of the plants/flowers. He is also extremely rude to the community that lives around the establishment. Do not give this place business unless you want to promote impolite behaviour and mediocrity.
